about_the_game:
This New Specialists DLC includes 2 new playable characters: Grenadier and Scientist

Grenadier

Alain Moulin used to be a prison guard in a maximum security facility. He once put down an uprising single handedly. Alain knows how to deal with large crowds, whether it’s prisoners or aliens makes no difference to him.

Scientist Divinus

With his inventions, he's trying to become the first Homo-Divinus. A human with godlike powers. Time is ticking for this old man as he is trying to find a way to harness the power from the energy crystals to attain immortality.

Download now for free!
detailed_description:
This New Specialists DLC includes 2 new playable characters: Grenadier and Scientist

Grenadier

Alain Moulin used to be a prison guard in a maximum security facility. He once put down an uprising single handedly. Alain knows how to deal with large crowds, whether it’s prisoners or aliens makes no difference to him.

Scientist Divinus

With his inventions, he's trying to become the first Homo-Divinus. A human with godlike powers. Time is ticking for this old man as he is trying to find a way to harness the power from the energy crystals to attain immortality.

Download now for free!

name: From Space - Grenadier and Scientist Specialists

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) / Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB) / GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Sound Card or stronger
  • Additional Notes: Controller highly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-9590 (8 * 4700) / Intel Core i7-6700 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 (8192 MB) / GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4096 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Sound Card or stronger
  • Additional Notes: Controller highly recommended. The Recommended Specification listed above allows gameplay experience at 60 FPS on average while using High graphical settings at 1080p resolution

short_description: This New Specialists DLC includes 2 new playable characters: Grenadier and Scientist
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
